prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a sea creature with flowing tentacles and vibrant colors.
Imagine a plant-based Pokemon with purple and pink features, thriving in a lush forest environment.
Design a Pokemon that has a unique underwater appearance, with features inspired by ancient fossils.
Generate a Pokemon with a whimsical look, featuring bright colors and a playful personality.
Show me a mysterious Pokemon with a blend of rock and plant elements, perfect for caves and wetlands.
Make a creature that embodies the essence of the ocean, with soft colors and a gentle demeanor.
Give me a Pokemon that combines the traits of a flower and a sea creature, with vibrant tentacles.
